message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire this unique product, which I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business.  I'm confident that it's worth at least $1,200,000 to you. I'm willing to let it go for $1,000,000.  This is a significant price reduction from its true value, and it allows you to secure a valuable asset at a great price. Please consider this offer carefully, as I am confident you won't find this opportunity again.
